mapper.insert: INSERT INTO charge_record (user_id, station_id, status, start_kwh, target_kwh, start_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{stationId}, #{status}, #{startKwh}, #{targetKwh}, #{startTime})
mapper.select: SELECT record_id AS recordId, user_id AS userId, station_id AS stationId, status, start_kwh AS startKwh, target_kwh AS targetKwh, charged_kwh AS chargedKwh, start_time AS startTime, end_time AS endTime, duration_min AS durationMin, charging_cost AS chargingCost FROM charge_record WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 'CHARGING'

SELECT r.record_id AS recordId, r.user_id AS userId, r.station_id AS stationId, s.station_name AS stationName, r.status, r.start_kwh AS startKwh, r.target_kwh AS targetKwh, r.charged_kwh AS chargedKwh, r.start_time AS startTime, r.end_time AS endTime, r.duration_min AS durationMin, r.charging_cost AS chargingCost FROM charge_record r LEFT JOIN charging_station s ON r.station_id = s.station_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.start_time DESC
